name: Potion of Healing
description: A red liquid in a glass vial. Heals 2d4+2 hit points when consumed.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
description: A red liquid in a glass vial. Heals 4d4+4 hit points when consumed.

name: Potion of Superior Healing
description: A red liquid in a glass vial. Heals 8d4+8 hit points when consumed.

name: Potion of Supreme Healing
description: A red liquid in a glass vial. Heals 10d4+20 hit points when consumed.

name: Potion of Fire Breath
description: A potion that allows the drinker to exhale fire, dealing 4d6 fire damage.

name: Potion of Climbing
description: A potion that grants the drinker a climb speed equal to their walking speed for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: A potion that makes the drinker invisible for 1 hour or until they attack or cast a spell.

name: Potion of Speed
description: A potion that grants the effects of the Haste spell for 1 minute.

name: Potion of Giant Strength
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Strength score to 21 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Water Breathing
description: A potion that allows the drinker to breathe underwater for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Heroism
description: A potion that grants the drinker 10 temporary hit points and the effects of the Bless spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Resistance
description: A potion that grants the drinker resistance to a type of damage for 1 hour.

name: Elixir of Health
description: An elixir that cures diseases, poison, blindness, deafness, and restores lost hit points.

name: Oil of Slipperiness
description: A viscous oil that grants the effects of the Freedom of Movement spell when applied.

name: Potion of Vitality
description: A potion that removes exhaustion, cures diseases, and maximizes hit points regained for 24 hours.

name: Bead of Refreshment
description: A bead that can create a full meal for one person when crushed.

name: Bead of Nourishment
description: A bead that can sustain a creature for one day when consumed.

name: Philter of Love
description: A potion that makes the drinker charmed by the next creature they see for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Animal Friendship
description: A potion that allows the drinker to cast the Animal Friendship spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Gaseous Form
description: A potion that allows the drinker to assume a gaseous form for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Mind Reading
description: A potion that allows the drinker to cast the Detect Thoughts spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Fire Resistance
description: A potion that grants the drinker resistance to fire damage for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Strength score to 23 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Invulnerability
description: A potion that grants the drinker resistance to all damage for 1 minute.

name: Potion of Longevity
description: A potion that reduces the drinker's age by 1d6+6 years.

name: Potion of Clairvoyance
description: A potion that allows the drinker to cast the Clairvoyance spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Vitality
description: A potion that removes exhaustion and cures any disease or poison affecting the drinker.

name: Potion of Mind Control
description: A potion that allows the drinker to cast the Dominate Person spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Diminution
description: A potion that reduces the drinker to one-tenth of their normal size for 1d4 hours.

name: Potion of Growth
description: A potion that increases the drinker's size to Large for 1d4 hours.

name: Potion of Superior Invisibility
description: A potion that makes the drinker invisible for 1 hour, even if they attack or cast a spell.

name: Potion of Dragon's Breath
description: A potion that allows the drinker to exhale dragon's breath, dealing 6d6 damage.

name: Potion of Etherealness
description: A potion that allows the drinker to enter the Ethereal Plane for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Clairvoyance
description: A potion that allows the drinker to cast the Clairvoyance spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Strength
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Strength score by 1d4+1 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Intellect
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Intelligence score by 1d4+1 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Wisdom
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Wisdom score by 1d4+1 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Charisma
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Charisma score by 1d4+1 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Dexterity
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Dexterity score by 1d4+1 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Constitution
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Constitution score by 1d4+1 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Stoneskin
description: A potion that grants the drinker resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Tongues
description: A potion that allows the drinker to understand and speak any language for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Animal Shapeshifting
description: A potion that allows the drinker to transform into a common animal for 1 hour.

name: Potion of the Cat's Grace
description: A potion that grants the drinker advantage on Dexterity checks and saving throws for 1 hour.

name: Potion of the Bull's Strength
description: A potion that grants the drinker advantage on Strength checks and saving throws for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Fire Giant Strength
description: A potion that increases the drinker's Strength score to 25 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of the Eagle's Splendor
description: A potion that grants the drinker advantage on Charisma checks and saving throws for 1 hour.

name: Gem of Brightness
description: A gem that can produce up to 50 beams of light, each capable of blinding a target.

name: Gem of Seeing
description: A gem that allows the user to see things as they actually are, casting True Seeing for 10 minutes.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A simple iron dagger. It's well-balanced and reliable, often used as a last resort weapon.

name: Leather Armor
description: Basic armor made of hardened leather. Provides minimal protection but is light and flexible.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Fireball spell, dealing 8d6 fire damage in a 20-foot radius.

name: Scroll of Cure Wounds
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Cure Wounds spell, healing 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier hit points.

name: Scroll of Teleportation
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Teleport spell, instantly transporting themselves and up to eight willing creatures to a designated location.

name: Scroll of Shield
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Shield spell, providing a +5 bonus to AC until the start of their next turn.

name: Scroll of Invisibility
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Invisibility spell, making a creature invisible for up to 1 hour or until they attack or cast a spell.

name: Scroll of Fly
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Fly spell, granting a creature a flying speed of 60 feet for 10 minutes.

name: Scroll of Dispel Magic
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Dispel Magic spell, ending one spell of 3rd level or lower on a target.

name: Scroll of Revivify
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Revivify spell, bringing a creature that has died within the last minute back to life with 1 hit point.

name: Scroll of Counterspell
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Counterspell spell, interrupting a spell being cast by another creature.

name: Scroll of Greater Restoration
description: A scroll that allows the caster to cast the Greater Restoration spell, ending a debilitating effect such as petrification, curses, or reductions to ability scores.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A sturdy wooden shield. Offers basic defense against attacks.

name: Adventurer's Pack
description: A backpack filled with essential supplies like rope, rations, and a bedroll.

name: Healing Herbs
description: A small pouch of herbs used for treating minor wounds and ailments.

name: Torch
description: A wooden torch. Provides light for up to an hour when lit.

name: Waterskin
description: A durable leather waterskin. Can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

name: Map of the Region
description: A detailed map of the surrounding area. Useful for navigation.

name: Rations
description: Dried meat, cheese, and hardtack. Enough to sustain a person for a day.

name: 50 ft of Hemp Rope
description: A sturdy length of hemp rope. Can be used for climbing or securing items.

name: Flint and Steel
description: A small kit used to start fires. Essential for any adventurer.

name: Whetstone
description: A simple whetstone for sharpening blades. Keeps weapons in good condition.

name: Tent
description: A simple canvas tent. Provides shelter for up to two people.

name: Fishing Tackle
description: A small kit with hooks, line, and bait. Useful for catching fish.

name: Quiver of Arrows
description: A leather quiver holding 20 arrows. Essential for any archer.

name: Lantern
description: An oil lantern. Provides light for up to 6 hours when filled with oil.

name: Spyglass
description: A collapsible brass spyglass. Allows you to see distant objects clearly.

name: Blanket
description: A warm woolen blanket. Provides comfort and warmth on cold nights.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A small iron pot. Useful for cooking meals over a campfire.

name: Climbing Pitons
description: A set of metal spikes used for climbing. Essential for scaling steep surfaces.

name: Grappling Hook
description: A metal hook attached to a rope. Useful for climbing or securing objects.

name: Signet Ring
description: A ring bearing a family crest. Used to seal documents with wax.

name: Vial of Ink
description: A small glass vial filled with black ink. Used for writing.

name: Quill Pen
description: A feather quill. Used for writing with ink.

name: Journal
description: A leather-bound book with blank pages. Useful for recording adventures.

name: Lock and Key
description: A sturdy padlock with a small key. Useful for securing valuables.

name: Caltrops
description: A bag of small metal spikes. Can be spread on the ground to hinder pursuers.

name: Hammer and Nails
description: A small hammer with a pouch of nails. Useful for repairs and construction.

name: Hourglass
description: A small hourglass. Measures the passage of one hour.

name: Dice Set
description: A set of six-sided dice. Often used for games of chance.

name: Candles
description: A bundle of five wax candles. Provides light for up to an hour each.

name: Bag of Marbles
description: A small bag filled with glass marbles. Can be used for games or as a distraction.

name: Shovel
description: A small metal shovel. Useful for digging.

name: Crowbar
description: A sturdy iron crowbar. Useful for prying open doors and crates.

name: Chalk
description: A piece of white chalk. Useful for marking surfaces.

name: Perfume
description: A small vial of fragrant perfume. Used to mask unpleasant odors.

name: Soap
description: A bar of scented soap. Useful for cleaning.

name: Empty Flask
description: A small metal flask. Can be filled with liquid.

name: Signal Whistle
description: A brass whistle. Can be heard from a great distance.

name: Tinderbox
description: A small box containing flint, steel, and tinder. Used to start fires.

name: Small Mirror
description: A hand-sized glass mirror. Useful for personal grooming or signaling.

name: Handkerchief
description: A small cloth handkerchief. Can be used for cleaning or as a makeshift bandage.

name: Needle and Thread
description: A small sewing kit. Useful for mending clothes and other fabrics.

name: Herbal Poultice
description: A bundle of herbs wrapped in cloth. Used to treat wounds and reduce swelling.

name: Oil Flask
description: A small flask filled with oil. Can be used to fuel lanterns or as an improvised weapon.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A sturdy wooden staff. Can be used as a walking stick or a weapon.

name: Traveler's Cloak
description: A heavy woolen cloak. Provides warmth and protection from the elements.

name: Small Bell
description: A tiny brass bell. Can be used to signal or alert.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A red liquid in a glass vial. Heals 2d4+2 hit points when consumed.

name: Scroll of Firebolt
description: A magical scroll. Allows the user to cast Firebolt once.

name: Bag of Holding
description: A small bag that can hold much more than its size suggests. Can carry up to 500 pounds.

name: Driftglobe
description: A small glass sphere that emits light. Can float and follow the user.

name: Cloak of Protection
description: A cloak that grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

name: Alchemy Jug
description: A ceramic jug that can produce various liquids, such as water, oil, or vinegar.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
description: Soft boots that make no sound while walking. Grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

name: Ring of Water Walking
description: A silver ring that allows the wearer to walk on water as if it were solid ground.

name: Hat of Disguise
description: A hat that allows the wearer to cast Disguise Self at will.

name: Immovable Rod
description: A metal rod that becomes fixed in place when a button is pressed.

name: Decanter of Endless Water
description: A silver decanter that can produce a continuous stream of fresh water.

name: Rope of Climbing
description: A 60-foot rope that animates and can climb surfaces on command.

name: Goggles of Night
description: Goggles that grant darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

name: Eversmoking Bottle
description: A bottle that produces an endless supply of thick, obscuring smoke.

name: Gloves of Thievery
description: Gloves that grant a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) and Dexterity (Thieves' Tools) checks.

name: Lantern of Revealing
description: A lantern that reveals invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet.

name: Periapt of Health
description: A necklace that makes the wearer immune to disease.

name: Sending Stones
description: A pair of stones that allow communication over any distance, as long as they are on the same plane.

name: Wand of Magic Detection
description: A wand that can cast Detect Magic three times per day.

name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
description: Slippers that allow the wearer to walk on walls and ceilings.

name: Stone of Good Luck
description: A smooth stone that grants a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
description: An amulet that prevents the wearer from being targeted by divination magic.

name: Heward's Handy Haversack
description: A small backpack with extra-dimensional spaces that hold more than they appear.

name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
description: A cloak that allows the wearer to breathe underwater and swim at a speed of 60 feet.

name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
description: Gloves that grant a swim speed and a climb speed equal to the wearer's walking speed.

name: Winged Boots
description: Boots that grant a fly speed of 30 feet for up to 4 hours per day.

name: Quiver of Ehlonna
description: A quiver that can hold numerous arrows, bolts, and javelins without increasing in weight.

name: Broom of Flying
description: A broom that can be commanded to fly and carry the user.

name: Amulet of the Planes
description: An amulet that allows the wearer to cast Plane Shift once per day.

name: Rope of Entanglement
description: A rope that can ensnare and restrain targets on command.

name: Ring of Feather Falling
description: A ring that prevents the wearer from taking fall damage.

name: Boots of Striding and Springing
description: Boots that triple the wearer's jumping distance and prevent them from being encumbered.

name: Cape of the Mountbank
description: A cape that allows the wearer to cast Dimension Door once per day.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
description: Gauntlets that set the wearer's Strength score to 19.

name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
description: A belt that grants advantages on Charisma checks with dwarves and increases Constitution.

name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
description: A helm that allows the wearer to understand all spoken and written languages.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
description: A ring that prevents the wearer from being detected by divination magic.

name: Circlet of Blasting
description: A circlet that allows the wearer to cast Scorching Ray once per day.

name: Amulet of Mighty Fists
description: An amulet that enhances the wearer's unarmed strikes and natural attacks.

name: Wand of Secrets
description: A wand that reveals hidden doors and traps within 30 feet.

name: Ring of the Ram
description: A ring that can unleash a forceful blast of energy.

name: Circlet of Human Perfection
description: A circlet that makes the wearer appear more attractive and charismatic.

name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
description: Gloves that allow the wearer to catch and deflect projectiles.

name: Boots of Levitation
description: Boots that allow the wearer to cast Levitate at will.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
description: A cloak that grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

name: Helm of Telepathy
description: A helm that allows the wearer to communicate telepathically with others.

name: Ring of Invisibility
description: A ring that allows the wearer to become invisible for up to 1 hour.

name: Ring of Protection
description: A ring that grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

name: Cloak of Displacement
description: A cloak that causes the wearer to appear to be in a different location, granting disadvantage to attackers.

name: Wand of Fireballs
description: A wand that can cast Fireball up to 7 times before needing to be recharged.

name: Belt of Giant Strength
description: A belt that sets the wearer's Strength score to 21.

name: Bracers of Defense
description: Bracers that grant a +2 bonus to AC if the wearer is not using a shield or wearing armor.

name: Ring of Spell Storing
description: A ring that can store up to 5 levels worth of spells.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff that can cast various healing spells.

name: Amulet of Health
description: An amulet that sets the wearer's Constitution score to 19.

name: Cape of the Mountbank
description: A cape that allows the wearer to cast Dimension Door once per day.

name: Cloak of Arachnida
description: A cloak that grants the wearer spider climb and resistance to poison damage.

name: Ring of Evasion
description: A ring that allows the wearer to avoid damage from area effects.

name: Ioun Stone of Regeneration
description: A floating stone that grants the wearer the ability to regain hit points over time.

name: Deck of Many Things
description: A deck of cards that can produce both beneficial and harmful effects when drawn.

name: Wand of Polymorph
description: A wand that allows the user to cast Polymorph.

name: Staff of the Magi
description: A powerful staff that can store and cast a variety of spells.

name: Boots of Speed
description: Boots that allow the wearer to move twice their normal speed.

name: Necklace of Fireballs
description: A necklace that allows the wearer to throw beads that explode into Fireballs.

name: Sword of Sharpness
description: A sword that deals extra damage and can sever limbs.

name: Shield of Missile Attraction
description: A shield that attracts missiles and grants the wearer resistance to damage from them.

name: Robe of Stars
description: A robe that grants the wearer the ability to cast Magic Missile and enter the Astral Plane.

name: Amulet of the Planes
description: An amulet that allows the wearer to cast Plane Shift once per day.

name: Rod of Rulership
description: A rod that allows the wielder to charm creatures.

name: Wand of the War Mage
description: A wand that grants a bonus to spell attack rolls.

name: Manual of Quickness of Action
description: A book that increases the reader's Dexterity score.

name: Rod of Lordly Might
description: A rod that can transform into various weapons and has several other abilities.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A cloak that grants the wearer invisibility for up to 2 hours.
